column4: I can't configure my wireless network card in feisty.  I was able to do it in Edgy.
ryanz, start in single usermode and then change the password of your user...
noacpi is an instruction you give the kernel.. =) it tells it to not use acpi...
yo how do i do that?  I can get xp to boot fine as always, but i can't get past the ubuntu login screen, even though i know my username and pw are correct.  How do i do single user mode?
